itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, June 27, 2013
contentencoded:
It's good for businesses to try and look to the future for new opportunities, but here's an idea that might be getting ahead of itself: Paypal Galactic. PayPal wants to get into space payments. Space tourism is possibly a thing of the near future -- the company Virgin has scheduled its first consumer space flight for the end of this year.

Todd Wasserman, business editor at the website Mashable, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss.
title: Paypal gets intergalactic, planetary with space payments
